headline: A Look At CoStar Group (CSGP) Valuation As Longer Term Returns Lag Recent Gains
summary: CoStar Group stock snapshot and recent performance CoStar Group (CSGP) has attracted attention after recent share price swings, with the stock around $49.87. Returns over the past month and past 3 months show double digit declines, alongside a weaker 1 year performance. See our latest analysis for CoStar Group. CoStar Group’s recent 1 day and 7 day share price gains sit against weaker longer term share price returns, while the 1 year, 3 year, and 5 year total shareholder returns remain...

headline: Why The Narrative Around CoStar Group (CSGP) Is Shifting After Homes.com And Activist Pressure
summary: CoStar Group’s modeled fair value has been trimmed from US$80.74 to US$78.05, a change of about 3.3% that reflects a recalibration of expectations rather than a complete rethink of the company. Analysts are splitting into bullish and cautious camps, with some highlighting long-term growth potential around Homes.com and share repurchases, while others focus on execution risks, margin guidance, and pressure on valuation. As you read on, you will see how these shifting targets and opinions fit...
